src: bo muu$\sim$mo iisib-\textbf{ɪliile} ʊ-n-kasi gw-a Pakyɪndɪ, a-lɪnkʊ-bʊʊk-a kʊ-kw-aganil-a n=ʊ-n-nyambala ʊ-jʊ-ngɪ kʊ-n̩-gʊnda gw-a ma-jabʊ g-a n̩-dʊme Pakyɪndɪ
trs: Just as she was very accustomed to do, Pakyindi's wife went to meet with another man in Pakyindi's cassava field.' [Sokoni and Pakyindi]
